author: psteitz
msg: Improved efficiency in RandomDataImpl, LaguerreSolver, FastMath and
OutlineExtractor by moving conditional code into blocks where it is needed.
Reported and patched by Dave Brosius

author: bimargulies
msg: o initial attempt at adding aggregate goal, but not working yet.

author: sarowe
msg: SOLR-2452: fix m2-deploy-with-pom-template POM rewriting - the copy task was not overwriting, so only the first POM in each module was being used, resulting in no more than one external jar per module being created by generate-maven-artifacts, because the POM was the same for each.
